abstracts.cdata!:
The project is part of a Five-Year
            (1973-77) Highway Maintenance and Development Program
            financed by several agencies and consisting of the following
            components: Part I: Reorganization and improvement of
            highway maintenance operations; construction and equipping
            workshop facilities; upgrading of Monrovia Bypass (8.4 mi.)
            including detailed engineering and supervision of
            construction; preinvestment studies for port access and
            other keyroads; study to promote the Liberian construction
            industry (Bank/IDA). Part II: Provision of highway equipment
            and spare parts (USAID). Part III: Training of personnel to
            operate improved highway maintenance program (Germany). Part
            IV: Program Coordinator (UNDP).
